Package net.sf.wubiq.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseProperties
    Collects the value from properties.
    Is
    Helper class for testing common conditions.
    Labels
    Manages the label resources.
    PrintServiceUtils
    Utility for querying print service information.
    ServerLabels
    Gets the labels associated to wubiq's servers.
    ServerProperties
    Collects the value from wubiq-server.properties.
